summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Parks and Recreation Department and the City Light Department; authorizing transfer of partial jurisdiction over certain City (Parks and Recreation Department) property within Woodland Park Zoo in the west half of Section 7, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington, to the City Light Department for overhead and underground electrical distribution purposes. (P.M. \#250407-3-001).
